lore: The Smogs are entities blinded by rage, who seek revenge against all the inhabitants of Rodia. They are a constant problem for the humans and Pilwiz who work the land, because of the resentment they feel toward these activities. For their part, farmers especially detest the Scourge Smog, as the red smoke it emits can quickly dehydrate the crops. Entire harvests have been lost because of these creatures.
menagerieDialog: (It's spinning in place while mumbling its name over and over again.)
(It's emitting so much smoke that your creatures are doubled over in fits of coughing.)
(You can only hope that your other creatures doesn't have asthma.)
(It makes a whistling sound upon your approach, much like a tea kettle. Strange.)
(It's blowing large puffs of smoke into the air. That can't possibly be healthy for you and your creatures.)
name: Scourge Smog
